StackLayout: Show me Kendo UI StackLayout examples with different orientations, spacing, and responsive behavior. Include examples for common layout patterns and styling with Tailwind CSS classes. Provide complete implementation with all props.
AppBar: Show me Kendo UI AppBar examples with navigation patterns, active states, and responsive behavior. Include examples for different menu structures and styling. Provide complete implementation with event handlers.
Avatar: Show me Kendo UI Avatar with sizes and image fallback initials.
Typography: Show me Kendo UI Typography examples with different variants, sizes, and styling options. Include examples for common display patterns and accessibility features. Provide complete implementation with all props.
AutoComplete: Show me Kendo UI SearchBox/TextBox with clear button and submit icon.
ComboBox: Show me Kendo UI ComboBox configured for async filtering with server search, custom item template (icon + entity type), clear button, and dark mode compatible styles. Include API for onChange, onOpen, onFilter, and how to control popup width.
Button: Show me Kendo UI Button examples with complete props, event handlers, validation, and styling. Include examples for different states (enabled, disabled, error) and common use cases. Provide realistic sample data and accessibility attributes.
SVGIcon: Show me Kendo UI SVGIcon examples with different variants, sizes, and styling options. Include examples for common display patterns and accessibility features. Provide complete implementation with all props.
Badge: Show me Kendo UI Chip/Badge variants (danger for down).
Menu: Show me Kendo UI Menu/ContextMenu styled as speed dial with icons and keyboard navigation.
Drawer: Show me Kendo UI Drawer or Dialog-as-Drawer patterns for right-side forms with validation and submit/cancel buttons.
PanelBar: Show me Kendo UI PanelBar examples with different orientations, spacing, and responsive behavior. Include examples for common layout patterns and styling with Tailwind CSS classes. Provide complete implementation with all props.
Card: Show me Kendo UI Card examples with different orientations, spacing, and responsive behavior. Include examples for common layout patterns and styling with Tailwind CSS classes. Provide complete implementation with all props.
Form: Show me Kendo UI Form examples with complete props, event handlers, validation, and styling. Include examples for different states (enabled, disabled, error) and common use cases. Provide realistic sample data and accessibility attributes.
DropDownList: Show me Kendo UI DropDownList for selecting plan tiers with templates.
DateRangePicker: Show me Kendo UI DateRangePicker inside a Dialog with validation.
Label: Show me Kendo UI Label examples with different variants, sizes, and styling options. Include examples for common display patterns and accessibility features. Provide complete implementation with all props.
Tooltip: Show me Kendo UI Tooltip usage for small icons.
Sparkline: Show me Kendo UI Sparkline with red theme for errors.
MultiSelect: Show me Kendo UI ChipList/Chip for pill filters with selection and clear all.
Chart: Show me Kendo UI Chart configuration for area chart with stacked series and legend interactions.

Toolbar: Show me Kendo UI Grid Toolbar customization with conditional rendering based on selection.
Grid: Show me Kendo UI Grid examples with data binding, sorting, filtering, and pagination. Include examples with realistic sample data, custom cell templates, and responsive design. Provide complete implementation with all necessary props.
